results.title: Hardcore Henry
results.headline_credit: Russia and United States of America, 2015
results.brief_description: Henry, a newly resurrected cyborg, must save his wife/creator from the clutches of a psychotic tyrant with telekinetic powers, AKAN, along with his army of mercenaries. Filmed like a first-person-shooter videogame, Hardcore Henry definitely lives up to its name.

constellations_other.name: Capturing first-person POV
constellations_other.description: A comparison of how videogames and feature films have used first person POV shots and sequences and how (for the latter) camera technology has impacted on this.

results.description: Henry, a newly resurrected cyborg who must save his wife/creator from the clutches of a psychotic tyrant with telekinetic powers, AKAN, and his army of mercenaries. Fighting alongside Henry is Jimmy, who is Henry’s only hope to make it through the day. Hardcore takes place over the course of one day, in Moscow, Russia.
description_for_label: Henry, a newly resurrected cyborg who must save his wife/creator from the clutches of a psychotic tyrant with telekinetic powers, AKAN, and his army of mercenaries. Fighting alongside Henry is Jimmy, who is Henry’s only hope to make it through the day. Hardcore takes place over the course of one day, in Moscow, Russia.

results.title: Hard to Handle: Bob Dylan in Concert
results.creator_credit: HBO, Wolfboy Productions and Gillian Armstrong
results.headline_credit: Australia and United States of America, 1986
results.brief_description: In this concert filmed at the Sydney Entertainment Centre in 1986, Dylan is accompanied by Tom Petty and the band The Heartbreakers, as well as a very fine selection of new compositions in a concert film shot by Gillian Armstrong.

constellations_other.name: Brilliant careers (Gillian Armstrong)
constellations_other.description: Gillian Armstrong's feature film debut not only helped launch her own acclaimed career, but those of the actors as well.

results.title_for_label: Hard to Handle: Bob Dylan in Concert
results.description: Admired as one of the best lyricists of pop rock, Bob Dylan has his name recorded in music history. During his four decades career, he has been through many facets: from acoustic to electric guitar; from politicized to religious lyrics; from minimalist to very highly sophisticated arrangements. And his characteristic voice, for some, hoarse and full of style, for others a little out of tune, still influences many musicians. In this presentation filmed at the Sydney Entertainment Centre in Australia over February 24-25 1986, Dylan is accompanied by Tom Petty and the band The Heartbreakers, as well as a very fine selection of new compositions. To close the spectacle, Bob Dylan and Tom Petty perform a vocal duet in “Knockin’ on heaven’s door”, one of the most famous songs of this compositor.
description_for_label: Admired as one of the best lyricists of pop rock, Bob Dylan has his name recorded in music history. During his four decades career, he has been through many facets: from acoustic to electric guitar; from politicized to religious lyrics; from minimalist to very highly sophisticated arrangements. In this presentation filmed at the Sydney Entertainment Centre in Australia over February 24-25 1986, Dylan is accompanied by Tom Petty and the band The Heartbreakers, as well as a very fine selection of new compositions. To close the spectacle, Bob Dylan and Tom Petty perform a vocal duet in “Knockin’ on heaven’s door”, one of the most famous songs of this compositor.

results.title: Happy Feet
results.creator_credit: Kennedy Miller Productions, Animal Logic and George Miller
results.brief_description: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

constellations_other.name: There is no Planet B
constellations_other.description: While the climate emergency is very real, inspiring thousands and thousands of students to strike, documentaries, animated movies and dystopian genre films have warned about a world ravaged by global warming.

constellations_other.name: George Miller
constellations_other.description: For a guy who started his career as a physician, George Miller sure is a diverse filmmaker.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Kennedy Miller Productions, Animal Logic and George Miller
results.description:
You would’ve thought that the mind that brought cinemas the Mad Max series would also gift audiences with a feet-tapping, family-friendly blockbuster like Happy Feet. Trading the desert wasteland for frigid Antarctica, George Miller’s animated 2006 hit follows a young penguin on a quest to find acceptance. For emperor penguins, attracting a mate is a matter of the heart – or the “heartsong” – but for Mumble (Elijah Wood), who can’t sing, only dance, this proves an issue. Ostracised and ridiculed by the other penguins, Mumble finds a family with the Amigos, who love the young penguin’s dance moves. A story about accepting ourselves and overcoming life’s obstacles, Happy Feet also has a positive environmental message and was the fourth non-Disney or Pixar film to win the Academy Award for Best Animated Feature.

Aside from Miller, who directed, produced and co-wrote the film, Happy Feet has another Australian connection (besides an all-star Aussie cast) with its visual effects done by acclaimed Sydney-based animation studio Animal Logic – their first in a long string of hits that includes The Lego Movie.
description_for_label:
You would’ve thought that the mind that brought cinemas the Mad Max series would also gift audiences with a feet-tapping, family-friendly blockbuster like Happy Feet. Trading the desert wasteland for frigid Antarctica, George Miller’s animated 2006 hit follows a young penguin on a quest to find acceptance. Ostracised and ridiculed by the other penguins, Mumble finds a family with the Amigos, who love the young penguin’s dance moves. results.title: Hannah Gadsby: Nanette
results.brief_description: The Australian comedian Hannah Gadsby is taking an anti-comedy stance in her newest special.
results.description: The Australian comedian Hannah Gadsby is taking an anti-comedy stance in her newest special.
description_for_label: The Australian comedian Hannah Gadsby is taking an anti-comedy stance in her newest special.

results.title: Halloween: Resurrection
results.brief_description: Serial Killer Michael Myers is not finished with Laurie Strode, and their rivalry finally comes to an end. But is this the last we see of Myers? Freddie Harris and Nora Winston are reality programmers at DangerTainment, and are planning to send a group of 6 thrill-seeking teenagers into the childhood home of Myers. Cameras are placed all over the house and no one can get out of the house… and then Michael arrives home!
results.description: Serial Killer Michael Myers is not finished with Laurie Strode, and their rivalry finally comes to an end. But is this the last we see of Myers? Cameras are placed all over the house and no one can get out of the house… and then Michael arrives home!

results.title: Halloween
results.brief_description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween Night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.
results.description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween Night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

results.title: Hair
results.creator_credit: CIP Filmproduktion GmbH, United Artists, Lester Persky, Gerome Ragni, James Rado, Michael Butler, Miloš Forman, Ann Roth and Stuart Wurtzel
results.headline_credit: Germany and United States of America, 1979
results.brief_description: Hair is a 1979 musical war comedy-drama film adaptation of the 1968 Broadway musical Hair: An American Tribal Love-Rock Musical about a Vietnam War draftee, Claude, who meets and befriends a tribe of long-haired hippies on his way to the army induction center.

constellations_other.name: Hell no, we won't go
constellations_other.description: The cultural, social, psychological and political effects of the Vietnam War have been explored through cinematic classics, musicals and comedies.

results.creator_credit_for_label: CIP Filmproduktion GmbH, United Artists, Lester Persky, Gerome Ragni, James Rado, Michael Butler, Miloš Forman, Ann Roth and Stuart Wurtzel
results.description: “Hair” is a 1979 musical war comedy-drama film adaptation of the 1968 Broadway musical “Hair: An American Tribal Love-Rock Musical” about a Vietnam War draftee, Claude, who meets and befriends a tribe of long-haired hippies on his way to the army induction center. Claude heads to New York upon receiving his draft notice, leaving the family ranch in Oklahoma. He arrives in New York where he is rapidly indoctrinated into the youth subculture before reporting in for boot camp.
description_for_label: “Hair” is a 1979 musical war comedy-drama film adaptation of the 1968 Broadway musical “Hair: An American Tribal Love-Rock Musical” about a Vietnam War draftee, Claude, who meets and befriends a tribe of long-haired hippies on his way to the army induction center. Claude heads to New York upon receiving his draft notice, leaving the family ranch in Oklahoma. He arrives in New York where he is rapidly indoctrinated into the youth subculture before reporting in for boot camp.

results.title: Hackers
results.brief_description: A teenager who was arrested by the US Secret Service and banned from using a computer discovers a plot by a nefarious hacker and breaks the law to stop it.

constellations_other.name: Hack the planet
constellations_other.description: How do you represent something that's... kinda boring to look at, like hacking, when you're operating in a visual medium like film, TV and videogames?

results.description: Along with his new friends, a teenager who was arrested by the US Secret Service and banned from using a computer for writing a computer virus discovers a plot by a nefarious hacker, but they must use their computer skills to find the evidence while being pursued by the Secret Service and the evil computer genius behind the virus.
description_for_label: Along with his new friends, a teenager who was arrested by the US Secret Service and banned from using a computer for writing a computer virus discovers a plot by a nefarious hacker, but they must use their computer skills to find the evidence while being pursued by the Secret Service and the evil computer genius behind the virus.

results.title: H2O: Just Add Water
results.brief_description: H2O: Just Add Water revolves around three teenage girls facing everyday teen problems with an added twist: they cope with the burden of growing a giant fin and transforming into mermaids whenever they come in contact with water.

constellations_other.name: 2000s TV
constellations_other.description: The dawn of the new millennium brought a wave of Australian programming that was more ambitious and bolder than previous decades.

results.description: H2O: Just Add Water revolves around three teenage girls facing everyday teen problems with an added twist: they cope with the burden of growing a giant fin and transforming into mermaids whenever they come in contact with water.
description_for_label: H2O: Just Add Water revolves around three teenage girls facing everyday teen problems with an added twist: they cope with the burden of growing a giant fin and transforming into mermaids whenever they come in contact with water.

results.title: Grey Gardens
results.brief_description: Edie Bouvier Beale and her mother, Edith, two aging, eccentric relatives of Jackie Kennedy Onassis, are the sole inhabitants of a Long Island estate. The women reveal themselves to be misfits with outsized, engaging personalities. Much of the conversation is centered on their pasts, as mother and daughter now rarely leave home.

constellations_other.name: Reality TV me
constellations_other.description: Cult documentary Grey Gardens follows the everyday eccentricities of mother and daughter Big Edie and Little Edie. The women perform and speak candidly to the camera, and have been described as predecessors to reality TV stars.

constellations_other.name: Film-truth
constellations_other.description: The experimental documentary Man with a Movie Camera has had a lasting impact on the development of film styles.
